meanings.definition: The first part of the small intestine, connecting the stomach to the jejunum.
meanings.sent1: The duodena helps in digesting food after it leaves the stomach.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often check the duodena for any signs of inflammation or ulcers.
meanings.sent3: The duodena decided to take a break from processing food and went on strike!
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity led her to explore the duodena of the city, unraveling its secrets.
meanings.sent5: The duodena, like a diligent worker, diligently processes nutrients for the body.
